titleInfo.title: From "Improvised Theatre" to Scripted Roles. Literacy and Changes in Communication in North Italian Law Courts (12th-13th Centuries)
Charters and the Use of the Written Word in Medieval Society

bibliographicCitation.mla: Arlinghaus, Franz-Josef. “From "Improvised Theatre" to Scripted Roles. Literacy and Changes in Communication in North Italian Law Courts (12th-13th Centuries)”. Charters and the Use of the Written Word in Medieval Society. Ed. Karl Heidecker. Turnhout: Brepols, 2000. Utrecht Studies in Medieval Literacy, 5. 215-237.
